# The Whole Party
> Full-service party rentals and event setup in the San Francisco Bay Area.
> Sister brand of My Baking Creations (mybakingcreations.com), the Bay Area's trusted custom bakery since 2012.

## Business Information
- Name: The Whole Party
- Website: https://thewhole.party
- Phone: (707) 296-7777
- Email: party@mybakingcreations.com
- Address: 1096 Wildwood Ave, Daly City, CA 94015
- Hours: By appointment
- Founded: 2026
- Founders: George Abrahamyan, Yana Abrahamyan

## Service Area
San Francisco, Daly City, San Mateo, Hillsborough, Palo Alto, Mountain View, San Jose, Sausalito, San Rafael, Marin County, Peninsula, South Bay

## Bounce House Rentals (Full-Day, Setup & Teardown Included)
- Classic Castle Bouncer: $400/day — 15'x15'x12', ages 3-12, fits 8 kids
- Tropical Slide Combo: $550/day — 20'x15'x14', ages 4-14, bounce + water slide, hose hookup required
- Toddler Play Zone: $325/day — 10'x10'x6', ages 1-5, low-height fully enclosed

## Party Packages
- Essentials ($75/24 guests): Theme-matched plates, napkins, cups with lids, cutlery, tablecloth, candles, cake topper
- Full Party Setup ($275): Everything in Essentials + custom balloon arch (12 ft) + party favor bags (20) + on-site setup + themed banner & centerpieces
- Custom (varies): LED marquee letters, themed wall decor, backdrops, photo booth, any combination

## Add-Ons
- Balloon Arch: Custom color, 8-16 ft, theme-matched
- LED Marquee Letters: Light-up letters and numbers
- Dessert Table Setup: Display stand, backdrop, styling
- Photo Backdrop: Themed or branded, includes props and setup

## Corporate Events
- Company picnics, holiday parties, team celebrations
- One vendor, one invoice
- Trusted by clients of My Baking Creations: Google, Meta, Salesforce, DocuSign, Alaska Airlines
- Starting at $500

## Custom Desserts (via My Baking Creations)
- Branded cookies, logo cake pops, custom cakes available as add-on
- See: https://mybakingcreations.com/corporate.html

## How to Book
- Get a quote: https://thewhole.party/contact.html
- Call: (707) 296-7777
- Email: party@mybakingcreations.com
